title: Soul Reaver Aatrox Skin :D anyone interested?
body:
so i found this while searching ebay, whoever the pure genius made this! A SOUL REAVER AATROX SKIN! won't fail to mention it's freaking fantastic! 
http://www.ebay.com/itm/Aatrox-Soul-Reaver-League-Of-Legends-Mousepad-Mousepads-/261685676795?pt=LH_DefaultDomain_0&hash=item3cedae8afb 
I really wish if players could give this a little hype. I'm sure there are people who would love soul reaver aatrox as much as I do!  :3

replies.body: Yh I've seen that before. Didn't know what type of skin it was but now I know it's Soul Reaver Aatrox.
Riot should really make one! or some sort of reaper aatrox! or hand of death, herald of death, Bloodlust aatrox :3 .... whatever
